eventDescription.latestDescription:
Current severity level: Informational

Elevated delays in newly applied tags

[08:09 AM PDT] We have resolved the cause of the delays in newly applied resource tags becoming visible in Describe API calls in the US-EAST-1 Region.  Services that use tags during resource creation, may experience ongoing delays while they work through a backlog of requests. We continue to work towards full recovery.

The following AWS services have been affected by this event: APPSTREAM2 (Informational), BILLINGCONSOLE (Informational), CLOUD9 (Informational), EC2 (Informational), EKS (Informational), ELASTICSEARCH (Informational), SAGEMAKER (Informational), WORKSPACES (Informational).
